Leo P Martel

Hi there!

My name's Leo, and this is my website. Welcome! I love what you've done with your hair.

About me:

I like to write software, read, teach, sing, make jokes, play games and lift weights. Emacs can run Vim but Vim can't run Emacs. Indent with tabs, align with spaces. The P stands for Patrick.

About the site:

Here you can read my programming blog, look at some of my side projects, check out my credentials if you're a recruiter or bored, or just say hi. More is coming, but probably not soon.
